Name: Furious Sword
About the game: Furious Sword - This tells the story of a mysterious vagabond who fights the forces of evil for good. He will have to go through many trials on his way and who knows how it will end. Explore a huge world, fight gloomy monsters and help the locals and their problems. The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Travel across a huge world, meet friendly characters and complete their tasks. Pump up your level and unlock new abilities to fight evil!
Meta Title: Furious Sword: Nov 17, 2022, Alex Loman and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Furious Sword? Check out the release date (Nov 17, 2022), developer insights from Alex Loman, and a complete game summary.
